props.title: Build Beautiful Sites with deco.cx
props.subtitle: A stack-agnostic CMS that works with your existing TypeScript codebase

features.title: Visual Editing
features.description: Edit your site visually with a live preview. Changes update in real-time.

features.title: TypeScript Native
features.description: Your components define the CMS schema. No config files, no boilerplate.

features.title: Git-Backed Content
features.description: All content lives in git. Branch, review, and deploy with confidence.
